thread.title: BC man pleads guilty in 2005 death of 2-year-old boy in Calgary
thread.title_full: BC man pleads guilty in 2005 death of 2-year-old boy in Calgary

author: Tony Tighe
title: BC man pleads guilty in 2005 death of 2-year-old boy in Calgary
text:
January 31, 2017 5:23 pm BC man pleads guilty in 2005 death of 2-year-old boy in Calgary By Tony Tighe Consumer Reporter Global News 
Little Blake Harvey was killed in December 2005. Global News What is this?

Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
A British Columbia man has pleaded guilty in the case of a two-year-old boy who died in Calgary over 10 years ago. 
Ryan John Podhorodecki has pleaded guilty to manslaughter in the 2005 death of Blake Harvey. 
Ryan John Podhorodecki of Kelowna, British Columbia Global News 
At the time, police were told the toddler fell down the stairs. An autopsy later confirmed it was a homicide. 
In October 2015, Podhorodecki was arrested in Victoria, B.C. and charged with manslaughter. 
He was the common-law boyfriend of the little boyâ€™s mother at the time. 
Sentencing is scheduled for June 13.
